text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: My 3 win streak in the “Emperor Award”. Rice also.
Rice for “Emperor Award”?

The “Emperor Award” which was a goal for Mejiro McQueen, Just 
what is her aim to make Rice Shower run there?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: The booing at the (Kikkashou Award)…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Even though it was a scene that should be praised for blocking 
Bourbon's Triple Crown, it was if the voice was the opposite.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And coincidentally, a situation similar to the (Kikkashou Award) 
happens in “Emperor Award”.
choice_data_list: And then I put Rice in that race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There is a “scenery” that I want to show Rice there.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I will be responsible for the things that can only be told to 
those who run on the turf.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, Because you are a Trainer you can do it, raise 
Rice's level to the stage of the “Emperor Award”.
It's a big race for Mejiro McQueen.

To make Rice Shower run there, I think it was after a long time 
of thinking and agonizing.

But, I wonder if it is a really good idea. I keep 
just thinking of Rice Shower. But, If Mejiro McQueen 
is not able to run with all her might…
choice_data_list:
It's a race that takes your chance at 
a 3 consecutive wins, is it okay?

It's a race that takes your chance at 
a 3 consecutive wins, is it okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: hehe, Trainer-san thinks I'm going to lose. I'm really hurt.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I will say, I have no intention of losing. As the 
horse Girl of the Mejiro family, I will achieve 
the “Emperor Award” 3 consecutive wins.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san will have it tough. No matter which one wins, you 
have to comfort the other.

Mejiro McQueen laughs with a grin, but her desire to win the 
“Emperor Award” is real.

Even so, if you have a feeling you want to 
convey to Rice Shower with your run.
choice_data_list: I'll have Rice run out, too
I'll have Rice run out, too

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: yeah, thank you for your help.
During training the next day――

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: he… he… Um, How was my time?

The time is not that bad. However, when it comes to competition, 
you can't win by all means.

After all, the booing at the (Kikkashou Award), it seems that 
they have consigned themselves to competing and winning.

It's a good time. If this is the case, it looks like we can win 
even on that big stage.

It's a good time. If this is the case, it looks like we can win 
even on that big stage.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Big stage…. Is Rice's next race decided?

I have decided, but Rice Shower will surely 
refuse. Still, if she wants to win again―
choice_data_list: I want you to appear in the “Emperor Award”.
I want you to appear in the “Emperor Award”.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: heh, “Emperor Award”!?

Rice has the ability to win. It has already 
been proven in the (Kikkashou Award).

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
But, “Emperor Award” for McQueen-san 
this will be her 3 concuetive win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
In such an important race, Rice can't run 
in it. Even if I win, Again Rice will…

What I said so far, as I see Rice Shower's face down. It was as 
if I could hear the boos of that time.

In the end, Rice Shower did not give the okay about running for 
the “Emperor Award”.

Considering Rice Shower's feelings. I do not want to force her to 
run. But, I can't let it go like this…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san's Trainer?

It was the voice of Mihono Bourbon who 
was working hard on her own training.
Hey, Bourbon, are you doing Self-training?
Hey, Bourbon, are you doing Self-training?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Yes, the injury I suffered after the (Kikkashou 
Award). was finally healed.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: How is Rice-san doing? Is she still caring about that day?

That day, I was watching Rice Shower receiving boos 
upon getting first place. But now what I was looking 
at was Mihono Bourbon, nothing else.

She may be the one who cares about Rice 
Shower more than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I see…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The reason I am doing this self-training is not for the command 
of “Victory”, but I am doing it for myself.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
“I want to run and I can't help it” It became such a thought 
after losing to Rice.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I want to run 1 more time with Rice, and I want to win. This 
self-training is directed for that purpose.

To the Horse Girl Mihono Bourbon, Rice Shower 
was the first girl to win over her.

She wants to run one more time with that opponent, 
and is working hard on training.

The former Rice Shower and the present Mihono 
Bourbon are similar. The way you work hard for 
the opponent you want to win against.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Is there anything I can do to help? I 
want to run with Rice 1 more time.
Bourbon…

“I want to win” Rice Shower has lost sight of her true feelings. 
“I want to win” Mihono Bourbon's newborn feelings.
If you look at Rice Shower within Mihono Bourbon now.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I understand. Say the command, I will carry out your wishes.

Saying so, Mihono Bourbon with a soft 
expression felt very reassuring.
